long_description: Lightweight, weather worthy and strong for 3-season use, the REI Half Dome 2 Plus backpacking tent offers generous headroom, storage and easy access for 2. 2 side doors and 2 vestibules offer easy access and generous storage; 4 vents ensure the tent stays well ventilated. Plus sizing provides more room with an extended floor plan; it's 10 in. longer and 4 in. wider than the standard REI Half Dome 2. Rectangular floor plan optimizes usable space and allows comfortable sleeping shoulder-to-shoulder or head-to-toe. Color-coded poles and pole clips ensure an easy setup. Advanced frame design combines DAC(R) Pressfit poles with a unique dual-hub architecture to provide area-wide headroom with nearly vertical side and end walls. Exclusive Tension Truss architecture leverages bound seams to provide low-weight structural stability and to increase interior volume. 4 adjustable, high-level ceiling vents mitigate condensation by drawing cool air under the fly and exhausting warm, moist air. Hybrid floor combines sealed seams and bathtub curves to create a waterproof floor that stays taut for easy door zipper operation and to maximize volume at end walls. Multiple storage options include corner pockets, roof pockets and hang loops; additional pockets do double duty as gear storage and stash spots for the doors. Shape and position of tent door zippers allow for smooth, 1-hand operation; vestibule zipper can be opened more or less to fine tune weather protection and ventilation. Polyester rainfly holds a consistently taut pitch, is durable and resists UV degradation. No-wick welded construction ensures that moisture won't sneak through susceptible areas, such as guy-out points, pole wraps and zippers. Includes guylines with tighteners, stakes and pole repair tube; tapered, easy-to-stuff compression stuff sack, pole- and stake bags keep everyhing organized.
